channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Letâ€™s review a couple other concepts related to functions in Python. Main Function We can also create a main function in Python. The use of a main function in Python is not required at all - Python is designed as a scripting language, meaning we can write code directly in a Python file without using any functions at all. However, it is generally considered good practice to make sure all code is part of a function, and then we can include a main function as the starting point for any program.
